title.narrative: 3FM Serious Request 2016: Pneumonia in Ethiopia

description.narrative: Pneumonia is the leading cause of morbidity and mortality in the selected regions
The project will target children under five, care takers, and household with children under five
The purpose of the ERCS 3FM project is to reduce pneumonia mortality and morbidity among children under five in three regions.
in South Gondar, Gujji and Fafan zones
knowledge and skills building among care providers, health system strengthening, provision of quality care, addressing underlying causes
